abstract: Mr. Kenefick, a Princeton graduate, served as president and later chief executive of the Union Pacific Railroad in an era of deregulation and industry consolidation.
snippet: Mr. Kenefick, a Princeton graduate, served as president and later chief executive of the Union Pacific Railroad in an era of deregulation and industry consolidation.
lead_paragraph: John C. Kenefick, a former chief executive of the Union Pacific Railroad who steered the company through an era of industry consolidation and deregulation, died on July 15 at his home in Omaha. He was 89.

headline.main: John C. Kenefick, Former Rail Executive, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: John C. Kenefick, 89; Led Union Pacific
